table.name: wms_ware_order_task
table.Comment: 库存工作单表 库存工作单表

column.name: dict_item_code
column.Comment: 数据字典项目代码(可为空)

column.name: product_attr
column.Comment: 商品销售属性:[{"key":"颜色","value":"颜色"},{"key":"容量","value":"4G"}]

column.name: receive_status
column.Comment: 是否默认收货地址：0->否；1->是

column.name: pay_amount
column.Comment: 应付金额（实际支付金额）

column.name: promotion_amount
column.Comment: 促销优化金额（促销价、满减、阶梯价）

column.name: discount_amount
column.Comment: 管理员后台调整订单使用的折扣金额

column.name: pay_type
column.Comment: 支付方式：0->未支付；1->支付宝；2->微信

column.name: status
column.Comment: 订单状态：0->待付款；1->待发货；2->已发货；3->已完成；4->已关闭；5->无效订单

column.name: order_type
column.Comment: 订单类型：0->正常订单；1->秒杀订单

column.name: bill_type
column.Comment: 发票类型：0->不开发票；1->电子发票；2->纸质发票

column.name: confirm_status
column.Comment: 确认收货状态：0->未确认；1->已确认

column.name: delete_status
column.Comment: 删除状态：0->未删除；1->已删除

column.name: real_amount
column.Comment: 该商品经过优惠后的分解金额

column.name: product_attr
column.Comment: 商品销售属性:[{"key":"颜色","value":"颜色"},{"key":"容量","value":"4G"}]

column.name: factory_status
column.Comment: 是否为品牌制造商：0->不是；1->是

column.name: pics
column.Comment: 上传图片地址，以逗号隔开

column.name: type
column.Comment: 评论人员类型；0->会员；1->管理员

column.name: status
column.Comment: 帐号启用状态:0->禁用；1->启用

column.name: default_status
column.Comment: 是否为默认等级：0->不是；1->是

column.name: comment_growth_point
column.Comment: 每次评价获取的成长值

column.name: priviledge_comment
column.Comment: 是否有评论获奖励特权

column.name: payment_way
column.Comment: 付款方式 1:在线付款 2:货到付款
